definitions.definition: A hindrance ; that which impedes or obstructs progress ; impedance .
A disability , especially one affecting the hearing or speech.
examples: Working in a noisy factory left me with a slight hearing impediment .

definitions.definition: Baggage , especially that of an army; impedimenta .

main_definition: A hindrance ; that which impedes or obstructs progress ; impedance .
secondary_definitions: A disability , especially one affecting the hearing or speech.
( chiefly in the plural ) Baggage , especially that of an army; impedimenta .
